ref: 3266 kuṇḍa3 n. ʻ clump ʼ e.g. darbha -- kuṇḍa -- Pāṇ. [← Drav. (Tam. koṇṭai ʻ tuft of hair ʼ, Kan. goṇḍe ʻ cluster ʼ, &c.) T. Burrow BSOAS xii 374]
Pk. kuṁḍa -- n. ʻ heap of crushed sugarcane stalks ʼ;
bhal. kunnū m. ʻ large heap of a mown crop ʼ;
bhal. kunnū m. ʻ large heap of a mown crop ʼ;
N. kunyũ ʻ large heap of grain or straw ʼ, baṛ -- kũṛo ʻ cluster of berries ʼ.
